text: Q30.| Consider the following schedule S: r1(x), r3(y), r3(x), wl(x), c1, w2(y), r2(x), w3(y), c2, c3 Which one of the following statements is TRUE? (a) S is not recoverable but cascade less. (b) S is recoverable but not cascade less. (c) S is both recoverable and cascade less. (d) S is neither recoverable nor cascade less.
